Articles.Content:
Hello there.

I've been watching the forums for some time and decided it'd be nice to become a true member of the community, so I believe the road starts here

I started playing somewhere around 0.23, went through all the beginners' pain-in-the-ass stuff (spending few hours figuring out how to rendezvous, then giving up, watching tutorials on youtube, spending another few hours, watching how mechjeb does and THEN finally being able to do it on my own), but decided a new Career is the right thing to do with the coming of the new upgredable structures and stuff. So right now I am in the phase of exploring Mun, Minmus, Duna orbit and having just one successfull Duna Landing (images included).

I like my contraptions to both look good and be as functional as possible. No bugs exploting or anything.

Current career - hard settings, NEAR, Deadly Reentry and RemoteTech.

... and of course thanks a lot to Squad for making such a great game, I didn't even know space was such an awesome place before I started playing . And of course the Plugin makers - you rock as much!

List of missions

I will try to add links to my missions in Mission Reports here, so you can find them all in one place

A guide on Kerbal recovering for Dummies

A 10 step guide for Dummies on recovering Kerbals stranded on Minmus. Don't forget to fasten your seatbelts.

Duna Lander Mk II

My first successful Duna landing (in this career).

Full IVA Landing - Minmus Science Lander

My first (few) attempt(s) on doing a full IVA remote-controled landing. RemoteTech and Mission Control included.

Here is my first successful attempt to land on Duna with Deadly Reentry, RemoteTech and some other plugins that make playing KSP a little challenging

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Adding mission list

That was a nice Duna landing, congratulations and welcome to the forum.

Edited January 25, 2015 by Newt
weird error

Pozdravy from the country-you-always-get-confused-with

That's a nice little lander!

Thank you guys

It's the first time I managed to build something like this. I downloaded Deadly Reentry and this was the first (not counting tests) time I actually used a heatshield

I made a similar lander before it but it had so many construction flaws, that although I managed to land it, it was so horrible (lost two legs, had to decouple fairings in orbit) that I decided to mark it as debris and go with a failure

Scientists on Kerbin decided they (were totally bored) needed more science from Minmus.

I had to construct a high-tech (or not) science Lander aimed at Minmus Highlands to gather Goo Data, Science Bay data and Surface gravity data.

How to recover Kerbals from Minmus in 10 steps.

Guide for dummies.

Nice guides

Welcome to the forums by the way. We're all very nice here, so have a look around!
Very nice albums and too good for your 'hello' thread I think. They deserve their own thread in http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/55-Mission-Reports

Very nice albums and too good for your 'hello' thread I think. They deserve their own thread in http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/55-Mission-Reports

Aahh, that's exactly what I needed to know

Today I was just wondering whether there isn't a better place for this, but had a lot of work and didn't manage to browse the forum enough to find it (my bad). Thanks for the advice, I will surely do so.

Nice guides

Welcome to the forums by the way. We're all very nice here, so have a look around!

Thanks

I already noticed this is a wonderful community, that's exactly why I decided to become an active member I can't seem to convinced my friends to play KSP so it is great to have a place to share ideas and achievements

- - - Updated - - -

I added missions Mission Reports and put links to them up on top of this thread... do you think that's fine or is there some better place to have a list like this?
